welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Durango, Mexico! Get ready to experience the beauty of our colonial architecture, vibrant culture, and stunning natural landscapes. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring all that our charming city has to offer!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Guadalupe Victoria Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for domestic flights only.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
